```shell
FROM openjdk:8-jre-alpine

MAINTAINER xxx@sgcc.com.cn

RUN ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/localtime && echo 'Asia/Shanghai' >/etc/timezone

COPY acloud-bc-eureka-server-1.5.0-20191104.021740-73.jar /u01/app.jar

WORKDIR /u01

EXPOSE 18003

CMD java -Xmx512M -Xms512M -XX:MetaspaceSize=64m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=128m -jar app.jar
```

# 3.5.go
### 1.
```shell
package main


import (
    "fmt"
    "log"
    "net/http"
    "time"
)

func sayHello(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {
      new :=time.Now()
     fmt.Fprintf(w,new.Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05"))    
     fmt.Fprintf(w, "docker")
}
func main() {
    http.HandleFunc("/", sayHello)//URI
    log.Println("docker  80")
    er := http.ListenAndServe("0.0.0.0:80", nil)
    if er != nil {
        log.Fatal("ListenAndServe: ", er)
    }

}

```
### 1.go 
```shell
CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -a -installsuffix cgo -o main main.go

# 3.k8s
- pvpvcsc
![](assets/3.storage-in-k8s-2397258e.png)
## 3.1. PV
-   hostpathceph rbd nfs capacityaccessModescapacitysizeiopsaccessModesReadWriteOncenode ReadOnlyManynodes ReadWriteManynodes
```shell
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  labels:
    app: workspaces-pv
  name: workspaces-pv
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  capacity:
    storage: 5Gi
  claimRef:
    apiVersion: v1
    kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
    name: workspaces-pvc
    namespace: portal-nx
  nfs:
    path: /home/nfs/workspaces-pvc
    server: 192.168.3.149
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  volumeMode: Filesystem
```

## 3.2. PVC
- pvstorageclass pvc  pv pod cpu mem
```shell
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  annotations:
    volume.beta.kubernetes.io/storage-provisioner: fuseim.pri/ifs
  name: mysql-data
  namespace: esp
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 20Gi
  storageClassName: managed-nfs-storage
```
## 3.3. storageclass
-   iops  awsgcestorageclass
```shell
apiVersion: storage.k8s.io/v1
kind: StorageClass
metadata:
  name: managed-nfs-storage
parameters:
  archiveOnDelete: "false"
provisioner: fuseim.pri/ifs
reclaimPolicy: Delete
volumeBindingMode: Immediate
```
